articles.description: Some beetles go to great — and disgusting — lengths for their children.
articles.content:
Some beetles go to great and disgusting lengths for their children.
They scout for a dead mouse or bird, dig a hole and bury it, pluck its fur or feathers, roll its flesh into a ball and cover it in… [+2310 chars]
